content.query:
select * from 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data' ,
        format = 'csv', 
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )as [result_set]

****************************************************************************************************

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'select * from 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK ''raw/calendar.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'' ,
                format = ''csv'', 
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )as [result_set]
'
****************************************************************************************************
select MAX(len(date_key)) as date_key_length,
MAX(len(year_month)) as year_month_length,
    MAX(len(year_week)) as year_week_length,
MAX(len(month_name)) as month_name_length,
MAX(len(day_name)) as day_name_length
 from 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data' ,
                format = 'csv', 
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )as [result_set]

****************************************************************************************************
select * from 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data' ,
        format = 'csv', 
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',   
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    with(
        date_id BIGINT 1 ,
        Date DATE 2 ,
        Year SMALLINT 3,
        Month SMALLINT 4 ,
        Day SMALLINT 5 ,
        Day_Name VARCHAR(50) 6,
        Month_Name VARCHAR(50) 10,
        Day_of_Year SMALLINT 7,
        Week_of_Month SMALLINT 8,
        Week_of_Year SMALLINT 9,
        year_week BIGINT 12,
        year_month BIGINT 11


    )
    as [result_set]
